column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/1b439d245efe286c8305f337d6d3bf4d566ebd87 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Are you sure the leveldb flag is needed, and not just rebuilding? You may need to clear your leveldb subdir after upgrading to post-autotools code.\n

Closing; compilation flags are passed down into leveldb by the autotools-generated upper-level Makefile.

And readme-qt.md is gone (see doc/build-unix.md).
@bruiselee -fPIC is only appropriate for shared library code, and we are static linking LevelDB.\n
